title: Artificial intelligence for the public sector: results of landscaping the use of AI in government across the European Union
research_description: The paper reviews 250 cases across the European Union, assessing the impact of Artificial Intelligence (AI) on core governance functions such as policymaking, public service delivery, and internal management.
research_results: The study found that AI is primarily used to support public service delivery, followed by internal management functions. There was limited evidence of AI’s impact on policymaking.
future_research: Further research is needed to explore the governance 'of, with, and by AI,' particularly how AI impacts decision-making and its broader implications for public sector management.
